name: Pombero - The Lord of the Night
name_original: Pombero - The Lord of the Night
description:
Pompeo the lord of the night - is a first-person psychological horror game in which you will have many clues to overcome the challenges, which according to your ingenuity will help you to reveal the story.
Overcome fear when you need it and use your wits to solve your problems.
I play in 8D surround sound, so we recommend you use headphones
